…Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize and  celebrate a remarkable milestone for The Comanche Chief newspaper  located in my district.

For over 150 years, The Comanche Chief paper has provided trustworthy  news, thoughtful commentary, entertainment, and vital resources for the  people of Comanche County. It has served as a reliable voice for our  community…
